name: OsciCat
description: OsciCat is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a feline twist. Its box-like body resembles a cat, complete with adorable cat buttons for eyes and a screen on its belly. Its arms and legs are also cat-shaped, adding to its charming appearance. OsciCat is a proud member of the WebtrES club, utilizing its unique design and functionality to contribute to the club's projects and activities.
